mapper.select: SELECT USERNO, USERID, USERNM, USERPW, PHOTO, DEPTNO, CODENM USERROLE FROM COM_USER CU INNER JOIN COM_CODE CC ON CC.CODECD=CU.USERROLE WHERE DELETEFLAG='N' AND DEPTNO=#{deptno} AND CC.CLASSNO=1
SELECT USERID FROM COM_USER CU WHERE DELETEFLAG='N' AND USERID=#{userid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COM_USER(USERID, USERNM, USERPW, USERROLE, PHOTO, DEPTNO, DELETEFLAG) VALUES (#{userid}, #{usernm}, SHA2(#{userpw}, 256), #{userrole}, #{photo}, #{deptno}, 'N')
